attributes.action: Uber should have a panic button on the app for drivers safety and 24/7 contact.
attributes.background: I had aggressive customers who damaged my car. The reason I am doing this petition is for the safety of all Uber drivers. In some situations you won't be able to email Uber or call the police. The idea of a  panic button is that we can notify Uber that a drivers in danger and get a response ASAP.

rejection.details: This petition is calling on Uber, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
